recipes.title: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
recipes.description: 200g spaghetti, 2 cups tomato sauce, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 garlic cloves (minced), salt and pepper to taste, Parmesan cheese (optional)

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: 1 cup broccoli (chopped), 1 bell pepper (sliced), 1 carrot (sliced), 1 onion (sliced), 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 garlic clove (minced), cooked rice (to serve)

recipes.title: Chicken Salad
recipes.description: 2 cups cooked chicken (shredded), 1 cup lettuce (chopped), 1 cucumber (sliced), 1 tomato (chopped), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Banana Pancakes
recipes.description: 1 banana (mashed), 1 egg, 1/4 cup milk, 1/2 cup flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 tablespoon sugar, butter (for cooking)

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: 2 slices of bread, 2 slices of cheese, 1 tablespoon butter
